ygData.msgSnippet: I tried that already.  Didn t work.  Same as how the instructions for the compass seems to imply combining certain parts first, but you don t. ... gr0k -
ygData.messageBody:
I tried that already. Didn't work. Same as how the instructions for the
compass seems to imply combining certain parts first, but you don't.
